DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study compare pregnancy rate two different type progesterone supplementation in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Crinone 8 % Intravaginal Gel IM Progesterone Supplementation In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF )
DOC.detailed_description: The aim test hypothesis pregnancy rate woman age 40 undergoing vitro fertilization embryo transfer ( IVF-ET ) cycle different respect administration progesterone ( Crinone 8 % , intravaginal gel versus intramuscular progesterone ) .
DOC.criteria: Women reproductive age ( 2139 ) infertility appropriate candidate IVF/ET FSH < 15 mIU/ml Women 21 39 year age assign stimulation 2 8 amp Luteal Lupron/FSH Luteal Lupron FSH/HMG . Women 3 previous IVF/ET cycle
